sitemapList.title: Sitemaps
sitemapList.subtitle: Manage sitemaps to include them into index sitemap.xml

formSitemap.descriptionFilename: Filename is the unique sitemap identifier in context of index sitemap, i.e.: 'electronics.xml', 'products.xml', etc. Requirements for sitemap filename are the same to the file system. Please avoid of using 'sitemap.xml' as sitemap filename.
formSitemap.descriptionUrlTemplate: To generate a sitemap URL can be used the next patterns: {storeUrl} - will be replaced with store URL value, {storeSecureUrl} - will be replaced with store secure URL, {language} - will be replaced with language code (i.e. en-US), {slug} - will be replaced with SEO semantic URL part

sitemap.noSitemapsIemsMessage: There are no sitemap items yet

confirmRemoveSitemap.title: Removing sitemaps
confirmRemoveSitemap.message: Do you want to remove sitemap?

errorMessages.filenameNotUnique: Sitemap with this filename is already exists
